row.process:
:SET &RUNDIR# = '&RT#/&SUBSYS#/SQL' :SET &LOGDIR# = '&LOGSRV#/&SUBSYS#/log/SQL'
:SET &ORADB# = "DLLW1&IDT#" :SET &ORAUSER# = "bbsbat" :SET &ORASCRIPT# = "vermittler.sql"
cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&ORASCRIPT# select distinct y.MANDANT, y.KOLL_VTR_NR, y.P_ID as P_ID from ( select distinct LV.MANDANT ,LV.KOLL_VTR_NR ,VM.P_ID ,RANK() over (partition by LV.MANDANT, LV.KOLL_VTR_NR order by LV.MANDANT, LV.KOLL_VTR_NR, VTR.POL_DAT desc, LV.VTR_NR desc) as FOLGE ,VTR.POL_DAT ,VTR.VTR_NR from TBBVTR_LV LV ,TBBVERM VM ,TBBVTR VTR ,TBBKOLL_VTR KV ,(select x.MANDANT, x.KOLL_VTR_NR from ( select distinct LV.MANDANT ,LV.KOLL_VTR_NR ,VM.P_ID from TBBVTR_LV LV ,TBBVERM VM where 1=1 and LV.KOLL_ART_SKZ in (8,9,19) --and LV.KOLL_VTR_NR > 5009 and LV.WIRKBIS = 99991231 and VM.MANDANT = LV.MANDANT and VM.VTR_NR = LV.VTR_NR and VM.VERM_ART_SKZ = 'B' and VM.WIRKBIS = 99991231 ) x group by x.MANDANT, x.KOLL_VTR_NR having count(*) > 0 ) tmp where 1=1 and LV.MANDANT = tmp.MANDANT and LV.KOLL_VTR_NR = tmp.KOLL_VTR_NR and LV.KOLL_ART_SKZ in (8,9,19) and LV.WIRKBIS = 99991231 and VTR.MANDANT = LV. MANDANT and VTR.VTR_NR = LV.VTR_NR and VM.MANDANT = LV.MANDANT and VM.VTR_NR = LV.VTR_NR and VM.VERM_ART_SKZ = 'B' and VM.WIRKBIS = 99991231 and LV.MANDANT = KV.MANDANT and LV.KOLL_VTR_NR = KV.KOLL_VTR_NR ) y where 1=1 and y.FOLGE = 1 and not exists ( select * from tbbkoll_vtr_rolle r1 where y.mandant = r1.mandant and y.koll_vtr_nr = r1.koll_vtr_nr and r1.koll_roll_art_skz = 'BVM' and r1.wirkbis = 99991231 ) order by y.mandant, y.KOLL_VTR_NR ; __EOF__
:INC JOBI.SQL_CSV ! ----------------- ! Returncode setzen ! ----------------- exit $rc
